00105    // Clean the temp dir. Note that now where we have auto recovery the temp
00106    // dir is not cleaned at start up anymore. But it is cleaned when the
00107    // program is exited normally.
00108    static void CleanTempDir();
00109 
00110    // Check the project for errors and possibly prompt user
00111    //
00112    // forceerror: Always show log error dialog even if no errors are found
00113    //             Important when you know that there are already errors in
00114    //             the log
00115    //
00116    // silentlycorrect: Do not show an error dialog (except if forceerror is
00117    //             true) and silently correct problems the "safest" way.
00118    //             This leaves orphaned blockfiles on disk, but replaces
00119    //             files that are not found by silence
00120    //
00121    // bIgnoreNonAUs: Do not count non-AU files as orphaned block files, per <import> tag.
00122    //             For example, <branding> JPG and <import> OGG.
00123    // 
00124    int ProjectFSCK(bool forceerror, bool silentlycorrect, bool bIgnoreNonAUs = true);
00125    
00126    // Remove all orphaned blockfiles without user interaction. This is
00127    // generally safe, because orphaned blockfiles are not referenced by the
00128    // project and thus worthless anyway.
00129    void RemoveOrphanedBlockfiles();
00130 
00131    // Get directory where data files are in. Note that projects are normally
00132    // not interested in this information, but it is important for the
00133    // auto-save functionality
00134    wxString GetDataFilesDir() const;
00135    
00136    // This should only be used by the auto save functionality
00137    void SetLocalTempDir(wxString path);
00138    
00139    // Do not delete any temporary files on exit. This is only called if
00140    // auto recovery is cancelled and should be retried later
00141    static void SetDontDeleteTempFiles() { dontDeleteTempFiles = true; }
00142
